main.title: {{{display_name}}} Web Interface
main.reboot_content_suffix: will only be applied after rebooting. Reboot now?

util.reboot_text: The web interface will be reloaded automatically after the restart.
util.subnet_invalid: The subnet mask must have four groups between 0 and 255 separated with a dot. For example 255.255.255.0
util.gateway_invalid: The gateway IP must have four groups between 0 and 255 separated with a dot. For example 10.0.0.1
util.gateway_out_of_subnet: Gateway address not in the configured subnet
util.subnet_captures_localhost: Specified IP address and subnet mask not allowed: Would capture localhost (127.0.0.1).
